SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.controller.room

Class PlayerInfo

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.controller.room.PlayerInfo
public class PlayerInfo extends Object
This class is used by the Room to store information about a specific client, like its username, color and ready state. It also manages the VirtualView of the client.
